divs: Sighting DetailsApril 28th I was outside smoking at around 10:30 pm. I saw what appeared to be a large star changing color. Then it started moving in a triangular motion, also left, then right. I ran nextdoor and woke my friend out of bed, calling her by the wrong name I was in such shock. She came out and also saw what I had seen. The next night we were with another friend and saw even more activity, including one rise straight up and fly off into the distance.On the third night I drove to my other friends house in Cornville to show him (the biggest skeptic I know), and he too saw them all changing color, but we did not see any major movement that night. It is now May 3rd and they still occupy the sky. None of us have video cameras, but would like someone to investigate these objects. I have never doubted that there was something else out there, but I NEVER in a million year thought I would witness what I have been seeing. I left my phone number, please feel free to call me with any further quetions, and PLEASE someone come out and video tape this!
